raw_body: RANEE AMARATUNGA (nee SENEVIRATNE),​ Retired Teacher from St. Joseph’s Balika,​ Kegalle and former Principal of Royal International School,​ Kegalle,​ wife of the late Jin Amaratunga,​ loving mother of Cheleka and Dmitri,​ mother-in-law of Avindra and Vibhu,​ sister of Ajantha and the late Monica,​ Benita and Madura and loving grandmother of Leyanvi,​ Kisali,​ Nikhil and Mithyl,​ passed away. Cortege leaves residence No. 48,​ Guwan Watte,​ Kadirana,​ Negombo on Wednesday April 3,​ at 4 p.m.022762
